backend/main.mo: Actor defines a Time type and computes local time of day based on epoch seconds and timezone offset.
feature_evidence.json: JSON report listing features, related files, components, tests, and confidence levels.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Text file mapping frontend source paths to short functional summaries for each component or module.
frontend/.env.example: Example environment file noting no API keys are required for offline operation.
frontend/CLEAN_REDEPLOY.md: Guide describing when and how to perform a clean rebuild and redeploy of the frontend.
frontend/index.css: Global Tailwind-based CSS defining color tokens, dark theme variables, and base styling.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point loading the React app from main.tsx.
frontend/REGRESSION_CHECKLIST.md: Manual regression testing checklist covering layout, navigation, widgets, pages, and data behavior.
frontend/scripts/clean-rebuild.sh: Bash script that deletes build artifacts, reinstalls dependencies, runs checks, and builds the project.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main React app component that handles onboarding gating and page navigation with a bottom nav.
frontend/src/components/ApiKeySettings.t: Empty placeholder component for API key settings.
frontend/src/components/ApiNinjasRepromp: Empty placeholder component for API Ninjas reprompt logic.
frontend/src/components/BottomNav.tsx: Bottom navigation bar with five tabs and icons, calling onNavigate to switch pages.
frontend/src/components/CaloriesBurnedAp: Empty placeholder component for calories API key settings.
frontend/src/components/HeaderMeasuremen: Component displaying weekly and monthly body measurements from the store.
frontend/src/components/LiveCalendarWidg: Auto-updating time and date widget showing 24-hour time and full date breakdown.
frontend/src/components/OnboardingGate.t: User onboarding form that captures a name, validates it, and triggers onboarding completion via the app store.
frontend/src/components/ParsedMealPrevie: Displays parsed meal items with calories, macros, and totals using styled UI components.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages a backend actor tied to Internet Identity, refreshing dependent queries when identity changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides Internet Identity auth context and logic for login, logout, and identity restoration.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Empty file noting that Zustand handles state instead of backend queries.
frontend/src/hooks/useResultCountdowns.t: Hook that computes and updates weekly and monthly countdown values based on the user's start timestamp.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind configuration defining global styles, color variables, utilities, and layout constraints.
frontend/src/lib/calories.ts: Provides calorie burn calculations for cardio and gym activities using MET values and simple heuristics.
frontend/src/lib/caloriesBurnedApi.ts: Empty placeholder for a calories‑burned API module.
frontend/src/lib/caloriesBurnedKey.ts: Empty placeholder for a calories‑burned key module.
frontend/src/lib/countdowns.ts: Utility functions computing days remaining in weekly and monthly cycles based on a start timestamp.
frontend/src/lib/descriptionFlow.ts: Parses meal descriptions locally and enriches entries with nutrition data from local estimators and databases.
frontend/src/lib/indianNutrition.ts: Defines an Indian food nutrition database and a lookup function with exact and partial matching.
frontend/src/lib/mealPromptParser.ts: Parses free‑text meal prompts into structured food items with estimated gram quantities.
frontend/src/lib/mevsa.ts: Contains a general nutrition database, lookup function, and partial exercise list for Mevsa.
frontend/src/lib/nutrition.ts: Fetches nutrition data by querying Indian and Mevsa databases with a fallback estimator.
frontend/src/lib/nutritionix.ts: Empty placeholder file for Nutritionix integration.
frontend/src/lib/onlineNutrition.ts: Empty placeholder file for online nutrition lookups.
frontend/src/lib/openFoodFactsKey.ts: Empty placeholder for OpenFoodFacts API key or config.
frontend/src/lib/portionEstimates.ts: Provides default and food‑specific unit‑to‑gram conversions for portion estimation.
frontend/src/lib/store.ts: Zustand store managing daily data, goals, food entries, gym activities, and user settings.
frontend/src/lib/webSearchNutrition.ts: Empty placeholder for web search–based nutrition data.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Root React entry point setting up providers and rendering the application.
frontend/src/pages/Dashboard.tsx: Renders the main dashboard showing streaks, study/gym/nutrition stats, goals, and widgets using store data.
frontend/src/pages/Goals.tsx: Displays daily goals with completion tracking, progress bar, and school toggle, updating state via the store.
frontend/src/pages/Gym.tsx: Manages gym and cardio activity logging with a dialog form, calculating calories and storing activities.
frontend/src/pages/Nutrition.tsx: Handles food entry logging with optional nutrition lookup and shows total calories, protein, and sugar consumed.
frontend/src/pages/Study.tsx: Allows adding, updating, and categorizing study topics while showing progress across done, pending, and later states.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures Tailwind theme extensions, custom colors, animations, and plugin setup for the project.
project_state.json: Tracks project metadata, existing features, and a pending UI update request involving greeting placement and countdown indicators. Contains version info, feature entries, and project configuration flags.
